A direct downgrade from overwatch 1 in every way possible.

The matchmaking system is terrible, the shop items are insanely overpriced, balancing changes make the devs seem clueless,  no content for 3 years in exchange for cancelled content. Who knows if PVE is actually good now that its out, who wants to give more money to this shit company to try it?

- Overwatch 2
- The game is now free to play
